parameters: Learn all the magic and techniques.
Learn all the magic and techniques.
Give the pear of the holy tree.
Magic crystals can be used in battle.
I'd rather crack and trigger it unexpectedly.
I guess we could crack it open from the start and take on the boss.
If you don't want to use it, you can keep it in the blue item storage.
Don't waste your time breaking it.
I'll smelt you anytime you want, just come and show your face once in a while.
Give the pear of the holy tree.
Then I'll trade you a magic crystal as a reward.
This is it, this is it. Mmm-hmm.♪
The fruit is wonderfully packed, and the aroma is rich...
I never thought Satan would be so happy...
If you find it, bring it back to me.
Oh, no!　You can't leave me here!
We don't have any other use for it, so why not!
Give the pear of the holy tree.
You've fought your way this far.
I don't think I'll be giving you any more advice.
Do you know how to use it well?
It is when you use a sword that magic plays an even more important role.
The funny thing about this adventure is that I can do it all by myself.
I'll smelt you anytime you want, just come and show your face once in a while.
Give the pear of the holy tree.
Then I'll trade you a magic crystal as a reward.
This is it, this is it. Mmm-hmm.♪
The fruit is wonderfully packed, and the aroma is rich...
I never thought Satan would be so happy...
If you find it, bring it back to me.
Oh, no!　You can't leave me here!
We don't have any other use for it, so why not!
How dare you ask me such a question?
You're about to step into the ultimate spice.
No, I don't want to do that.
Don't tell me you don't know where the spices come from?
Haha, you've got to be kidding me.
Don't tell me you don't know.
You know that the forest around this building is a treasure trove of spices.
I thought you rented the cabin from me.
You know, with you, I was really hoping that was the reason.
What the hell are you doing looking at me like that?
Oh, no, I wasn't looking at you funny!
I thought you'd like the curry...
It was a bit of a shame to let it go, but...
I heard you made curry and you'd be happy to invite me to dinner.
I'm sorry I didn't tell you. I'm sorry I...
Lord Kikoushi of the demon world...
Don't expect me to cook for a single person like me.
They're growing all over the walkway.
Some of the kind I brought in, you know.
But watch out for those bugs that have sprung up recently.
It was as if they had eaten the spirit plants I had planted by mistake.
Spiritual grass is, uh, magic power increasing?
Yeah, I think it got mixed up with the spice seeds.
We tried to collect it, but it had already been eaten up.
They look like larvae, but they're big and they have a big appetite.
Fire is their weakness, so it's safe to burn them to exterminate them.
You're a genius at bringing trouble to people.
I won't give you a magic crystal for your praise.
Give the pear of the holy tree.
About the location of the labyrinth

I don't think I'll be giving you any more advice.
Do you know how to use it well?

No, I don't want to do that.

Haha, you've got to be kidding me.
Don't tell me you don't know.
You know that the forest around this building is a treasure trove of spices.
I thought you rented the cabin from me.
You know, with you, I was really hoping that was the reason.

I thought you'd like the curry...
It was a bit of a shame to let it go, but...

Don't expect me to cook for a single person like me.

Some of the kind I brought in, you know.

It was as if they had eaten the spirit plants I had planted by mistake.

Yeah, I think it got mixed up with the spice seeds.
We tried to collect it, but it had already been eaten up.
They look like larvae, but they're big and they have a big appetite.
Fire is their weakness, so it's safe to burn them to exterminate them.
You're a genius at bringing trouble to people.
I won't give you a magic crystal for your praise.
About the location of the labyrinth
What the hell is that map...
I thought you might have made this map.
You're not hiding from me again and making something weird, are you?
I'll grant one wish to anyone who makes it through.
Ha-ha-ha!　You really know your stuff, don't you?
Let the young mage conquer the dungeon.
The one who can break through will be welcomed as queen.
As a token of marriage, I'm going to give you a carbuncle of vows.
Is that what I wanted to do?
The flow is kind of similar...
That's what's been bugging me, though.
In case you're wondering, you're bored.
I don't think it's the same thing.
You know exactly what I'm talking about, Arle!
I always like to bring in something new!
I didn't want to bore you!
The map shows a lost forest guarded by witches.
Once past that, there is a vast underground area where an ancient labyrinth lies.
Sure, that labyrinth could be modified.
It's going to be a fascinating dungeon.
I don't remember messing with you.
Rather, in the land under the jurisdiction of witches, etc.
We're not supposed to be careless with it.
In the first place, something with as much magic as I have.
I don't think he's in the human world, but...
I guess some people think like me.
You didn't make that up, did you?
Yeah, I could swear to it.
（......... There is one thing that concerns me, though.）
Can I go and have a look?
You can do whatever you want.
No one but me can make an interesting dungeon, anyway.
I don't know why you're so competitive.
I'm going on summer vacation today.
Everyone in my class has gone away.
I should've made a plan too.
There's so little to do once the assignment is over...
I didn't make any plans for the future.
It's because I wanted to explore all I could.
There's a lot of danger, but if you can find something, it's a lot of fun.
I don't know about that. I'm just getting started.
It's still the opening, isn't it? It's too early to tell...
So, fairies who can be my guide.
Thank you for always looking out for me.
They say you can only see fairies when you're a child.
I saw a little bit of you the other day.
I haven't seen you since then, but...
It's just a sign, you know?
It's slight, but it's warm and comforting.
I never thought I'd be able to take a fairy on an adventure.
You're like a hero from a fairy tale!　Ehehe...
Keep an eye on me, fairy.
I'm going to make apple pie now, so wait for me, Kaa.
He ate more than half of it, but...
I managed to save some for myself.
And this is a prototype I made with leftover dough... Is it good?
I think I'll take a walk a little farther.
I'm so tired today, I think I'll go to bed.
Come on, Mr. Kerr, it's morning.
I'll be ready for you, but you have to be awake by then.
I'll make sure you know what to bring, okay?
strength of an organization (e.g. profitability, productivity, economic clout, stability, growth potential)（HP）I'll heal you!
strength of an organization (e.g. profitability, productivity, economic clout, stability, growth potential)（HP）and magic power（MP）You'll recover both!
I'd use one, but you can rest safely in front of the monument.
We're safe near villages and towns, though, so we don't need to rest.
Is this what it looks like?
I know what you're gonna say, but...
Instead of showing me the perfect forest for adventure.
They say it's your favorite food.
\i[781]聖樹の洋梨を採って来いって事でしょ？
I've never heard of that fruit before.
Are the pears from the holy tree also from a tree called the holy tree?
It's a name I gave myself.
Wait...!　There's no way to find it then!
I can't even ask around without knowing the names.
I don't even know what color or shape they are.
One look and you'll know for sure.
And the way I see it, that fruit must have recently appeared...
I don't think it's possible for someone else to eat you.
How come that's your favorite food?
Because I know the conditions under which the fruit will grow.
I can pretty much guess what it will taste like.
It may not be good for humans, but I'm a demon.
I can't stop drooling just thinking about it.
So, do you have a map or something?
You can at least tell me where that forest is, can't you?
I've created a warp spell in the basement of this house.
What the hell are you doing in a human house?
This house was originally a converted cabin that I built.
It's underground, originally dug for a different purpose, but...
They say that magic circles are more stable when they are written underground, right?
When writing down the magic circle of warp
（I'd rather write and erase over and over again outside the house.
I like it because it's easy to remember...）
Well... that's quite a challenge, isn't it?。
But you're going to fix this without me telling you, aren't you?
Because you're not the type to stop and listen.。
Oh, I've already prepared that for you.。
This is my school's gym uniform, right?
I don't know why you have it...。
Sure, I had some left over from your school.
I borrowed a new one that didn't belong to anyone else.。
How can you get into the school?
Hahaha, I have a big face too.。
What do you want me to do with this?
It's, uh, a special gym uniform that I enchanted.。
First of all, when you wear it, you can almost eliminate any sign of it.。
Even athletic shoes have sound deadening magic.。
You're very bright, Arl.。　When I wear this.
Encounters with enemies（encounter）There will be nothing left to do.。
However, there are some places and
It won't work on a visible enemy, so be careful.。
Furthermore, not only can you not equip it with anything extra, but you can't equip it with anything else.
The lack of armor makes them extremely vulnerable to blade attacks.。
Wear it when you want to run through the field without fighting.。
Sure, it's very nimble and convenient, but...
You brought me this, and now you want me to wear it.
I've been thinking about this for a long time.
She wants to see Aruru in her cheerful bloomers.
He wants to peek at you from underneath while you're flexing.
No, I'm not thinking about that.
Why is it a stick figure?
The basics of covert action, as I just taught you.。
Just because you don't get encounters doesn't mean you can't keep up with your gear.。
（Gym clothes are automatic.。No need to equip it.）
What, Mr. Kerr?　What are you doing here?
I'm sorry I was so reckless.
It's okay. It's okay. It's okay.
I swear, I'm gonna get you.
I won't leave you alone. I won't...
I was so relieved when I saw you.
I was in so much pain.
I'm just a girl, after all.
I have to think more about myself.
I can't go on without you.
Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Carbuncle is the only one who's back.
You scared the hell out of me.
You know, I always knew you'd come back.
（Oh, my God, what a look on your face, my future queen...）
You're back sooner than I expected, so...
I missed out on a picnic with Carbuncle-chan.
I want to eat curry and rice.
You've been watching me, Mr. Kerr.
It's just this one time, okay?
If she becomes my wife, I'll have to cook every day anyway.
And while we're at it, my preferences...
That's a weird thing to say.
I'm going to serve it to you and Mr. Kerr, okay?
Arle. One thing that's been bothering me.
When I did the reading on you.
There's one implication I'm curious about.
To solve the problem at its root.
You snuck into the enemy's hideout, didn't you?
And we still haven't saved the doctor from the lab.
I don't think we've properly tracked down the headquarters...
According to the divination, I saw two suspicious shadows.
Perhaps you're on the case. core I've touched on the
It's happening on the surface. accident I guess I've been through the
Which means the mastermind is still out there.
I'll sneak in one more time and...
You're not gonna be okay this time.
Eh... then what should I do?
You'd better think hard before you go.
Can I get you another one?
I don't know what that means.
And by shadow, I mean the other one...
Yeah, the transporter we just got.
Let's leave it in your room, because we don't want to break it.
For now, we'll take this place.
You left my wristband on your bed.
Don't forget to pack your gear.
Why don't we get some rest?
Do you want to make a save, too?
Why don't you get some rest?
Do you want to make a save, too?

There's a small frame with a picture on it.
Do you want to look at it?
Oh, you can't just come into my house!
No!　No, no, no, no, no, no!
I was wondering if I should come to you now.
The Forest of the Water Moon I knew it wasn't the root cause.
Yeah, and the dryads, and Trent, who I thought was the mastermind.
I was just being manipulated by something.
Before Trent disappeared, he said something that bothered me.
Someone is trying to use the forest to control all of us.
I have a really bad feeling about this.
I, too, was tangled in ivy in the Forest of Light.
When you're in control, you're in over your head.
You're the kind of prick who doesn't do anything on his own.
But now that you've had your fill.
In fact, now might be a good time to pull the trigger.
This summer vacation, you can do whatever you really want.
I don't care if you're an outsider from now on.
Just keep an eye on the forest we've been exploring.
The one who monitors this world.
When it comes down to it, it's my job to...
Well, there are some things only you can do.
I'll let that mastermind know what happens when he messes with my playground.
I'm not a man to be trifled with.
This world is inhabited by you humans and mamono.
The way of the world is for people to solve their problems and live in harmony with each other.
But it's not like I'm going to send you out on some adventure and let you experience all these things.
If you hadn't done it, maybe someone else would have.
You can listen to me as hard as you want.
Have a more enjoyable summer vacation!
Why don't you spend some time with Carbuncle?
There's no guarantee the problem will go away, though.
Hmm, wait a minute, something's bugging me.
It's like, when I do it, it works.
If you haven't solved the problem.
And you haven't been back here.
What am I doing that's so dangerous?
I mean, sure, there were some things that seemed impossible.
It's a problem that people like me can handle.
I thought you were just picking out the little anomalies.
（I didn't realize I was going around saving the world.）
There's nothing you can do about it.
You can't do that, can you?
That's just the way you are.
The sooner I let you know, the better.
We're just trying to keep the problem from getting out of hand.
I don't like the way you said that.
There were towns and places where it was too late to do anything about it, but...
We don't have a choice, do we?
You and I, we're not omniscient, omnipotent gods.
Some things you can only get by growing up.
It's always led to the best outcome.
Are we gonna drop this thing?
I'd like to finish what I started.
I don't know if it's something I can handle...
That's not very you, is it?
It's because we don't get too worked up about problems.
There are places where you can do more than you can do.
Not everyone is like that, though.
At a time when the world is in turmoil.
A girl on a walk, wandering in on a whim.
No way, I'm going to break the status quo.
I don't think you have the luck or the power.
You'll continue to stroll along as you always have, at your leisure.
All you have to do is punish the scoundrels who try to underestimate you.
Are you kidding me?　I don't know...
（You don't like to be honest from the start, do you? Yeah... I guess so.）
You were the one who didn't have that.
Go have a picnic and see the world around you.
I don't know if it'll work.
If I was really in danger, you'd have told me a little sooner!
In case you haven't noticed, you're the one who's sending me there.
You should at least give me a heads up about the danger.
I figured if I told you about the fun first, you'd get mad.
All right, I'll only advise you if it's really dangerous.
It's early, but it looks like an interesting magic circle is appearing.
The forests are vast, but rarely yield golden apples.
Stop by when you have time and build up your skills.
Also, I heard that a coffee shop has opened in Tanaoro City.
You'll get a lot of travelers, so you'll get some good information.
Oh, by the way, we've got a lot more magicians.
Are you sure you're okay with all these connections?
I wonder if anyone will come into my basement...
That's why I've been sitting on your doorstep.
I figured if anyone suspicious came in, I'd turn them away.
It's like you built this house halfway...
You can wait in your room while I'm gone.
Oh, my God, are you sure?
Don't ever go through anything weird!　Like drawers!
Finally, in Chapter 3, we get permission to go indoors... ugh!（tears of gratitude
（I don't know how to explain this to my customers.
I had the Demon Lord stay at home...?）
（It would suck if Leroux or someone came...）
This box is used to store items that are prohibited in the Traveler's Labyrinth.
A device that will transport you to the first floor of the Traveler's Labyrinth.。
Do you want to transfer the item?
※ Once you put it in, you won't be able to take it out here.
※ Two types cannot be inserted at the same time.
Transfer 3 magic crystals to the first floor of the Traveler's Labyrinth.。
※ The magic crystal will disappear when you escape from the labyrinth.

The magic crystal is being transferred to the first floor of the Traveler's Labyrinth.
